name: actions_list-workflow-run-artifacts
description: Lists artifacts for a workflow run. Anyone with read access to the repository can use this endpoint. If the repository is private you must use an access token with the `repo` scope. GitHub Apps must have the `actions:read` permission to use this endpoint.

owner.description: The account owner of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

repo.description: The name of the repository. The name is not case sensitive.

run_id.description: The unique identifier of the workflow run.

per_page.description: The number of results per page (max 100).

page.description: Page number of the results to fetch.
